    • Method Detail

      • getBuildRules

        Iterable<BuildRule> getBuildRules()
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable view of the rules in the index

      • getRuleOptional

        Optional<BuildRule> getRuleOptional(BuildTarget buildTarget)
        Returns the BuildRule associated with the given BuildTarget if it is already present.

      • computeIfAbsent

        BuildRule computeIfAbsent(BuildTarget target,
                          java.util.function.Function<BuildTarget,BuildRule> mappingFunction)
        Retrieve the BuildRule for the given BuildTarget. If no rules are associated with the target, compute the rule using the given supplier and update the mapping.
        Parameters:
        target - target with which the BuildRule is associated.
        mappingFunction - function to compute the rule.
        Returns:
        the current value associated with the rule

      • requireRule

        BuildRule requireRule(BuildTarget target)
        Retrieve the BuildRule for the given BuildTarget. If no rules are associated with the target, compute it by transforming the TargetNode associated with this build target using the TargetNodeToBuildRuleTransformer associated with this instance.

      • requireMetadata

        <T> Optional<T> requireMetadata(BuildTarget target,
                                Class<T> metadataClass)
        Retrieve a piece of metadata for a target. This metadata is computed via MetadataProvidingDescription.createMetadata(com.facebook.buck.model.BuildTarget, com.facebook.buck.rules.BuildRuleResolver, com.facebook.buck.rules.CellPathResolver, T, java.util.Optional<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<com.facebook.buck.model.BuildTarget, com.facebook.buck.versions.Version>>, java.lang.Class<U>).

      • addToIndex

        <T extends BuildRule> T addToIndex(T buildRule)
        Adds to the index a mapping from buildRule's target to itself and returns buildRule.

      • getEventBus

        @Nullable
BuckEventBus getEventBus()
        An event bus to send log messages. It's just here for convenience and has no relation with how BuildRuleResolver works.

      • getRuleOptionalWithType

        default <T> Optional<T> getRuleOptionalWithType(BuildTarget buildTarget,
                                                Class<T> cls)
        Returns the BuildRule associated with the given BuildTarget if it is already present, casting it to an expected type.
        Throws:
        HumanReadableException - if the BuildRule is not an instance of the given class.

      • getRule

        default BuildRule getRule(BuildTarget buildTarget)
        Returns the BuildRule associated with the buildTarget.
        Throws:
        HumanReadableException - if no BuildRule is associated with the BuildTarget.

      • getRuleWithType

        default <T> T getRuleWithType(BuildTarget buildTarget,
                              Class<T> cls)
        Returns the BuildRule associated with the buildTarget, casting it to an expected type.
        Throws:
        HumanReadableException - if no rule is associated with the BuildTarget, or if the rule is not an instance of the given class.

      • requireAllRules

        default com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<BuildRule> requireAllRules(Iterable<BuildTarget> buildTargets)

      • getAllRules

        default com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<BuildRule> getAllRules(Iterable<BuildTarget> targets)

      • getAllRulesStream

        default RichStream<BuildRule> getAllRulesStream(Iterable<BuildTarget> targets)
